description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. RADIAL GUN is an experimental game where you must kill the eye to advance to the next level. To kill the eye destroy all blocks on screen. Blocks are either red, green or blue. Destroying a block that is the same color as the eye launches a seeking projectile towards you, so be careful!
